title: Denis's mixed vegetable soup
ingredients: ['25ml olive oil', '25g butter', '1 large onion, chopped', '1/2 teaspoon garlic granules', '1/2 teaspoon celery salt', '1/4 teaspoon ground black pepper', '1/2 teaspoon ground turmeric', '4 cardamon pods, seeds only, finely crushed', '1/4 teaspoon ground fenugreek seeds (optional)', '1/2 teaspoon mixed herbs', '1 teaspoon sugar', '1 teaspoon soy sauce', '1/8 teaspoon hot chilli powder', '400 to 500ml chicken or veg stock', '500ml passata or tinned tomatoes, blended', '250 to 300g frozen mixed veg', '1 medium potato, chopped into 1.25cm (1/2 in) cubes', 'creme fraiche or cream (optional)']
